thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Seriously Hurt In ATV Accident | Sunny 106.5

title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Seriously Hurt In ATV Accident | Sunny 106.5
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Maddie Seriously Hurt In ATV Accident posted by TMZ - 
( TMZ ) - Jamie Lynn Spears ' 8-year-old daughter Maddie was badly hurt in an ATV accident Sunday, and TMZ is told her condition is extremely serious. { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 982774, "name" : "Jamie Lynn Spears" } } 
Several sources in Kentwood, Louisiana tell TMZ, Maddie was on a Polaris off road vehicle when it flipped over. TMZ is told she was under water for several minutes and unconscious. 
TMZ sources say she was airlifted to a nearby hospital. 
TMZ is told Jamie Lynn was not with her daughter when the accident occurred. And, they're also told, Maddie was involved in a hunting expedition at the time of the accident. 
story developing
